name: The Ball 2
summary: The Ball 2 is a 2.5D physics based Platformer where you play as a Ball. You can finish little puzzles or play them against others in the Online mode. You can also play in the Challenge mode where you can play different challenges and compete with all other players for the fastes finish Time! The Ball 2 also has a Level editor and Steam Workshop Support for levels made by the community. The Ball 2 also saves Replays of your best best runs and if you got the world record your run gets uploaded so that all other players can see it.
